ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers, the previous peoples.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Moses continued): "Your Lord and the Lord of your fathers before you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Moses said: "(He is) Your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers of yore."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Moses continued, "He is the Lord and the Lord of your forefathers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Moosa, “Your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers preceding you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Musa) said: "Your Lord and the Lord of your ancient fathers!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Your Lord and the Lord of your fathers of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Your Lord and the Lord of your fathers, the ancients.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Your Lord and the Lord of your fathers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses went on, "He is your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: your Lord and the Lord of your ancient fathers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Your Lord, and the Lord of your forefathers!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Moses) said: "Your Lord and the Lord of your fathers from the beginning!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Musa (Moses) said: "Your Lord and the Lord of your ancient fathers!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said, 'Your Lord and the Lord of your fathers, the ancients'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Your Lord and the Lord of your ancestors of old.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Moses] said, "Your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:26] He, Moses, said, ‘Your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers’. Now, even though this [fact] is comprised by what was [said] before it enrages Pharaoh, and therefore:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Moses said: (Your Lord) He is your Lord (and the Lord of your fathers.
